damageExternalDesc: Premium Report opens outside: accident data is not displayed in this application.
mileageExternalDesc: The Premium report opens outwards and can include mileage history.
theftExternalDesc: Raporti Premium hapet jashtë dhe mund të përfshijë kontrollet e vjedhjes.
enterFIN: Enter the FIN number to get the complete vehicle history
externalDetailedDesc: Detailed accident history, verified mileage and theft checks from {{PROVIDER.countries}}. Report opens in a new tab in
infoExternal: Note: Purchasing and viewing the report occurs entirely on the provider's website. This app does not store payment or report data.
validateFinError: The FIN number is invalid. It must be 17 characters (A-Z, 0-9, no I, O, Q)
noDataFoundError: Invalid FIN or no data found
